text: @DavidLammy @brexit_sham WHY can't we take the same measures as on the Continent for petes sake?  The Continent is also asking themselves why we are not doing the same as them. I read something yesterday about the Coronavirus which made me wonder whether, I hate to say it, if it was all set up to happen.
